name: The Watcher (itch) (Zaidis)
description:
You are in Jackson Forest, living inside of an abandoned school bus. You have the feeling that you are not alone, as if someone is right next to you. Uncover the story behind what happened in the forest, and unveil the story behind The Watcher. Be careful, you never know when hes standing right behind you.

How to play

Use WASD to move and Mouse to look around. Hold Shift to spring and Control to crouch. Toggle your flashlight with F.

Press E on objects to interact with them. You may also interact with newspapers. Simply press E to exit out of them. Press E on the objectives as well.
Music

- That's life (Frank Sinatra - 1966)

- Turn Around, Look at Me (The Vogues)

- Happy Days (Pratt, McClain - 1976)

Assets used

The Shed - Unity Asset Store - Blackant Master Studio

Medieval Tent Small - Unity Asset Store - kawetofe

Rock package - Unity Asset Store - shui861wy

Blood splatter decal package - Unity Asset Store - NorSat Entertainment

Trees and ground textures can be found in the Unity Asset Store. They are Unity's property.  Water as well.

Grass Flowers Pack Free - Unity Asset Store - ALP8310

Street Lamps - Unity Asset Store - SpaceZeta

Textures - textures.com

All other assets were made by us (The bus, any anything inside of the bus besides the Switchfoot albums/How to Train your Dragon DvDs, and Old Gregg from the Mighty Boosh on the TV).

Credits

Adam Weber - Lead Map Designer, Story, Voice Acting

Jake Klein - Watcher Movement, Story, Audio

Dylan Oelke - Watcher Movement, Audio, Voice Acting

Dan Carmichael - Lead Artist, Audio

Anne Krueger - Voice Acting

Made during a game jam 2020. Thanks for checking it out!
